messages.message:
btw i added this as step 3 in this section (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yQOCxOISV_ukUxXdPJDoN-rERtOhdVRe7zv1swF1igw/edit#heading=h.k6qnozmvng12) of the eng onboarding doc - feel free to suggest edits! the instructions only cover running `core-platform-service` locally, not in docker

(i think we should encourage engineers to run everything in docker, but that opens a whole other can of worms :sweat_smile: since weâ€™ll need to fix some things in the repo and change that entire section of the onboarding doc)
One thing I would love to do with this doc is get it down to a few instructions as possible. If newly onboarded folks use crafting sandboxes, I think a lot of these instructions can just be skipped.
100%, it would be so cool if everyone can just use crafting and not have to worry about the m1 quirks :pray:
